name: @cloudflare-r2-object-storage-browser/windows
description: Windows WinUI 3 application for Cloudflare R2 Object Storage Browser

scripts.build: pnpm run prebuild && dotnet build CloudflareR2Browser.csproj -c Debug
scripts.build:release: pnpm run prebuild && dotnet build CloudflareR2Browser.csproj -c Release
scripts.publish: pnpm run prebuild && dotnet publish CloudflareR2Browser.csproj -c Release -r win-x64 --self-contained
scripts.publish:arm64: pnpm run prebuild && dotnet publish CloudflareR2Browser.csproj -c Release -r win-arm64 --self-contained
